A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not a Star Wars movie.  All prior character development is ignored or tossed aside.  The attempt at humor is forced.  The plot development is weak.  I actually believe this movie to be weaker than the prequel trilogy. Those movies at least played by the laws of the Star Wars universe and plot point and attempted to push technology barriers in film.  This movie is just a long rip off.
